Name: Sunil G
Title: Good
Review: First of all you will definitely confused here in selecting brands and things. It contains so many clothing and footwear brands. It's well maintained and following all the covid precautions.It is one of the old and famous mall in Hyderabad city

Name: Ranadeepreddy
Title: Hope less
Review: It is hope less ,they don't know how to recieve customers .No electricity when I went .Better to close the mall.

Name: Baburao S
Title: Very bad experience
Review: Worst shopping experience that I ever had.(1) Buy2Get1 Offer: Even though we selected apparel from offer spot, cashier told couple of items were not categorized under offers. We end up going back and forth, contacted manager to get offer. Wasted 30 mins time at billing. We couldn't alter our jeans due to this time wasted by staff.(2) Buy for 5999 and get 2000 vouchers: This is another false/fake promise. I didn't receive vouchers even after 4 days to my registered phone number.(3) Website, Email and Phone numbers as shown on the receipt won't work. Please see the pics attached.

Name: coped
Title: one of the best mall in Hyderbad
Review: central mall is good looking .best to go shopping for clothes.to attrative to people to watch the movies best place to go central mall pvr

Name: Srinivas
Title: Worst experience
Review: Online mycentral.in is much better compared to Hyd Central.Pls don't visit HYD Central, 1. No Covid Precautions2. Misbehaviour of staff and security.3. No proper parking arena.4. High rates compared to online.5. Always system shutdowns.6. No seniors available in the store.Worst ever store in Hyderabad

Name: Niya1315
Title: Good Mall
Review: Hyderabad Central Mall is near Punjagutta crossing. There are two buildings in this mall. Central mall is especially good to buy clothes. The options for dining are limited. This mall can be easily reached by public transport.

Name: Xyzz
Title: Central mall
Review: It is one of the expensive mall in Hyderabad.. Located near gacchibawli... Place is nice and expensive.

Name: Sami
Title: My opinion
Review: Recently I have wented to Central mall with family. It is clean and good parking, good facilities there I have watched movie and have snacks and there every thing is nice.

Name: ceenu1969
Title: One stop to shop
Review: Good place and in heart of city and have foidcourt and multiplex and shopping... Its access to metro train and all modes of transport

Name: Arihant Katariya
Title: Very Much Poor Place For Shopping
Review: I Would Not Like To Go Back For Shopping In Hyderabad Central Mall.. It's Day By Day Getting Very Worst & Quality & Range Of Items In Clothing...I Tried & Searched Many Brands But Was Not At All Satisfied With Anyone Because They Had A Very Limited Range And As Well As Old Stock Of Items...This Kind Of Unsatisfactory Review Doesn't Suit For The Brand "Hyderabad Central"

Name: Girish Kumar Goud
Title: Umbrella of brands
Review: This is my 1 of all time favourite stores in the city which consists of all top brands including a PVR multiplex

Name: Praveen
Title: Good
Review: I visited last 15 days back. Maximum all the brand's are avaliabe in the mall. Good to visit again...

Name: Naveen K
Title: Shopping
Review: Best place for complete family shopping Wide range of products in each categoryBest in discount and offers

Name: Happy life
Title: Very nice
Review: Very nice place for visit. We can spend 4-6 hour here for shopping with family. Also there is fun game.

Name: Sam
Title: Good place for branded clothes
Review: A good destination for branded and stylish clothes. Discounts available on majority brands. Nice destination for shopping.

Name: Silpa
Title: Food prices
Review: Shoping prices are good but food cost is very high. If the management ask KFC and other vendors to cut down the price definitely you can expect good results.

Name: jainms
Title: Central
Review: Hyderabad central mall is very good for shopping and lot of options to choose around. located exactly near punjagutta flyover. Cafeteria is OK.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Best shopping destination for everyone!!
Review: I have spent 5000 rs on shopping at central panjagutta . There is many types of brands and the cost is also reasonable and best cloth , so friends visit and enjoy..

Name: Favoh
Title: Very famous for shopping,  movies and favourite food
Review: Very famous for shopping,  movies and favourite food.The mall includes Marks and Spencer, as well as a range of movies, music, books, coffee shops, a food court, supermarket and restaurants.

Name: Sathvik
Title: It is very good
Review: The central HYDERABAD is very very good in shopping and it gives soo much offers for all the people in the HYDERABAD so i request you to construct a branch on karimnagar so i will come twice a week so the central shopping mall so it is very good to buy in the central

Name: Manaswini Sridhar
Title: Well laid out mall with friendly sales people.
Review: Quite a collection of bags and footwear. The display is not cluttered like in most malls. They have a huge watch and perfume section as well.

Name: SAnkeath
Title: Hyderabad central
Review: It is located in Banjara hills Hyderabad,The biggest mall for the shopping and the best place to get much and more amount of collections as well as much and more discounts too... The mall will be of 2 parts named tower A and Tower B.... There will be an connection internally from a to b.... In tower B there will be an hamelys, along with men and women garment's and in top floor there will be a food court I am including the photos of that food court too.... The name of the food court is THE WORK here the food is also good..... And reasonable.... And the attached floor consist of home Town where they will be of n_number of products which were used in our home and gifts and idols etc..,

Name: Shivateja
Title: Happy shopping
Review: It was a very pleasant experience to shop at Hyderabad central. A place where we can find all brands of shirts and jeans with great offers of discounts and vochers. We cannot strain ourselves in shopping as there is quiet and silent environment with PVR on the top floor. We can also get complementary movie tickets if we shop more than ten thousand. There are many offers all the time in the mall which makes us to buy more and more. The costs of the items will be available to all class people

Name: atlblond
Title: Very good store for clothes
Review: This “mall” was closest to my hotel (ITC Kakatiya) and a 57 rupee Uber ride away. It’s two big stores, one for home goods which is more limited, the other for clothes which is extensive. Loved the styles and prices. Wish I could shop for clothes in India all the time! Reminds me of Paris but a third of the price. Be sure to take a cloth bag or you can buy one for 13 rupees there.

Name: JOEKENNEDY
Title: Visit
Review: It's a nice mall with good ambienceand good for children and nice food joints at fair price. It's worth while a visit along with family members

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Very accessible nice Central Mall at Punjagutta circle,
Review: It's a fantastic mall  at Punjagutta Circle. Its a fantastic mall with Shopping, PVR multiplex for cinemas for movies, Store for gadgets and mobiles, KFC if you are a non-veg lover. Above all its very close to many places. And there will public transportation available for every place. It's one of the best mall that I found in Hyderabad. Watched two movies. In ground floor you have chat variety also. It's a perfect place for spending the day with your loved ones. You can spend a whole day once you visit here. And the prices are also reasonable and and same as many multiplex theatre. It's a must visit place. It's exactly opposite to Punjagutta police station. So you need not worry about the security if you are watching a late night show too.

Name: Anjani I
Title: Lack of people
Review: Came here for buying some clothes for me and my friends, collection are of wide range and one will definitely choose your one ,but wherever you go you have to call for people for help Everytime and most irritating thing is that at the end while billing you have to wait a long que as among many billing counter very few are manned, that too unprofessional and busy in themselves rather helping out.needs lot of improvement in terms of customer service.

Name: Asma
Title: Disheartened for losing my money
Review: I bought few items for sum amount of 5500 rupees and 3300 rupees on 19th jan 2019.Later i returned two items on 28th jan 2019( a shoe and t.shirt) worth 3000 rupees approximately and was given a credit note and that day itself that is on 28th jan 2019 i purchsed shoes for 1400 rupees from that credit note and i was given another credit note for remaining amount approximately 1600 rupees. Unfortunately I lost that credit note and the bill. I visited cebtral mall panjagutta and they were not able to help me out saying once credit note is lost nothing can be done. Then i wrote a mail and personally called to customer care central(1800-210-7777) and they said they too cannot help me out with this as it's not in their hands. However they asked me to visit store once. I did it and i was asked to write a mail to Hyderabad team. I wrote the mail on 26th feb 2019. And i contacted them. They again told me today that they too dont have any details. Before contacting  Hyderabad central i called payback center and they said they don't save details of purchase made frm credit note.Now my question is How come they dont save details of purchases credit note return etc in their system? It isnt a small amount.  I want to use my money of credit note. It was just a small slip. Help me out central team. Im not going to keep quite. My email id is asma_hafeeza@hotmail.com

Name: Manishpal
Title: good shopping experience
Review: huge mall,a good collection,cannot be completed in a day as there are two units.overall clean ,& a good ambience

Name: YatriForever
Title: Food & Shopping
Review: Nice to see the mall thriving even after two decades. The food options are plenty and interesting, now.  The mall was quite crowded on a Sunday afternoon when we were here , with so many for the shows in the PVR. The car parking was relatively easy.Good place to be for movie-food-shopping.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Branded cothes
Review: Went to buy clothes.But there are no offers and cost is very high.Only branded clothes are available.Movie theatres are also available.

Name: Jayanta Ray
Title: Cool well decorated all brands
Review: This place has a very good ambience and the architecture is also nice. it is situated in a crowded location of hyderabad and all types of brands  are tgere selling casual formal wears apparels, gymwear, perfumes, footwear anything to everything related to fashion.On third floor ther are having furnitures also.And the best part is that they all are having discounts.So haply to hear about discounts on everything.😁😁😁

Name: purplepassion212
Title: Horrible place to eat in the foodcourt.
Review: We went there and saw that the place has changed. There is a new wing now to the building.Where ohris use to be we saw there was another chain which was horrible n dirty. The prives were too high and food was tasteless and spicy. We opted for the chinese which was a disaster.All money wasted and stomach upset. If anynody wants to risk their lives go there.

Name: Rjkool
Title: Not good
Review: done with my shopping  at hyderabad central...............🙂🙂 its nice to feel 😊😊😊 and products are not good

Name: Resort52967924763
Title: Very good
Review: A very good place to shop, a little bit expensive, but good in product quality, better to visit in weekdays.

Name: karthikakavya
Title: Varients varieties Costs
Review: Can get from food grocery furnish goods to clothes and all other things. costs are not so affordable that and even clothes are costly as like obviously a such big mall wont sell at cheap prices though.!! further clothes quality is very good but not affordable for mostly budget shopping people. need to have patience abd energy to roam all over the mall to shop the needs . has lift and escalator facility . parking is available for large no.of vehicles.Thats it

Name: Sohith
Title: Hyderabad central
Review: Its best place for couples and students to enjoy with couples its best time pass place to visit having a theatre and shopping complex

Name: Kamal K Sirra
Title: Ethnic stuff
Review: Its one of the few shopping malls where you can find Some  typical indian dresses. I'd say the choice is not very big but you always come across something that catches your attention. Staff are attentive & helpful.

Name: Raja Pantham
Title: Worst Experience
Review: Food court on 4th floor has no sense at all they don't even know the difference between fork and a spoon and when we requested to arrange one spoon they were rude and called manager Teja Chowdary who says this itself is spoon and you need to have sambar or raitha only with this showing forkPathetic serviceWorst foodWorst customer experience

Name: Flyer64665265495
Title: Attract by keeping gifts like VIP luggage trolly's but they never give as always say no stock of gifts
Review: Done a shopping for my family during Dashara 2018 in Hyderabad Central mall at Panjagutta and I was suppose to get a VIP Trolly bag as gift. When visited customer desk, they said they do not have stock and said they will call back once the stock is ready. But they never called and when I visted they told the stock is still not available and I would receive a call once the stock is ready. But now its Diwali time and no one from central reached me. This is pathetic, they attract people by keeping festive gifts but they never give and always says no stock. Please do not get attracted by these kind of offers.

Name: Sightseer826292
Title: Very bad response
Review: Very bad service to customers Many brands but very expensive compared to otherNo response from customer side

Name: Surendar M
Title: Customer service
Review: Am shopping in central more than 30 times but always am observing there is no improvement in customer service, they didn’t change till now, especially in Kukatpally ( Hyderabad), no one respond to customers queries and they are telling irresponsible answers and didn’t have faith also. They don’t know how handle the publicMy suggestion please recruit educated and responsible persons for customer service purposeAm not explain my issues that is also wrost situation, please educate them and provide the quality services to public.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Very huge
Review: It is very huge mall and it have lot of shopping destination and you can found large number of brand outlets

Name: Saikiran Rao
Title: Shopping Mall
Review: Sprawled across five floors, the massive Hyderabad Central Mall is one of the most popular shopping malls in Hyderabad. Easily accessible from major parts of the city, this shopper’s pit-stop is located on Punjagutta Road and is a one-stop-shop for designer labels and international brands. Spanning 2,50000 sq. ft., Hyderabad Central houses book shops, cafes, restaurants, apparel stores, jewellery showrooms and even a food court. From Hidesign and Guess to Giovani and Blackberrys, there are a countless high-end stores for the big spenders here. The mall also offers something for movie buffs with a PVR Cinemas on its top floor.

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Hyderabad center mall, big and best mall we all like the time spend here, visit all shops for just time pass

Name: deepa v
Title: Good variety of clothes
Review: Wide range of brands are available for both men and women.Its better for western wear for women.prices are a bit high.Punjagutta central is the best outlet.gachobowli hasnt that much variety.

Name: gopi j
Title: awesome
Review: good place to shop. Hyderabad Central is a shopping mall in located on the Punjagutta road. The mall includes Marks and Spencer, as well as a range of movies, music, books, coffee shops, a food court, supermarket and restaurants. The shopping space is spread over four levels, with PVR Cinemas located on the top (fifth) floor

Name: tiktianc
Title: Take note, no cameras allowed inside.
Review: I was barred from entrance as I had a film SLR in my bag, but was told smart phones are fine to take in as it would be infeasible to ban them too. Make of it what you want of all the photos posted of the inside on whether there is a difference between a smartphone and a camera.The inside of the mall is ok, fairly typical. Did not check on the quality of the bathrooms or anything, which makes are usually good for. Poor review primarily because of silly rules.

Name: njydlife
Title: Shopping & entertainment
Review: Good place to go shop and also has all the top known eateries . This place hosts Pvr cinemas as well with all recent movies played

Name: TrueCityZen
Title: Absolutely clumsy;Pathetic parking;Limited elevators only till 3rd floor;None while coming down
Review: This one of the centrally located places in Hyderabad but with the worst facilities and management. I was there this weekend and it was chaotic.The first one to greet you would be the mall security and Punjagutta traffic, to let you know that there is no parking available. If you have tickets for PVR, you are on your own.Once you enter the mall, the elevators take you till 3rd floor and then you need to take the fire evacuation stairs.On the way back from fifth floor, there are absolutely no elevators - you need to walk down. The other day I saw parents with young kids and elderly people struggle a lot while getting down the stairs.Its a pity that the GHMC, Fire and Police let this mall operate with such low standards - The L&T Next mall a few metres away is much much better than this.Do avoid this mall if possible- there are much better and safer malls in Hyderabad. Have a safe visit by going to them.

Name: renn
Title: Nice shopping place
Review: A one stop solution for clothing, spread over 5 floors and a large area. It has clothing, accessories from all popular brands. Renovation of some parts were in progress when I visited.

Name: JaneFonda57
Title: Shopping at Central Mall
Review: My husband & I , together with our grown up sons visited this Mall on 19th Feb.We were pleasantly surprised with the  wide choice of Western & Ethnic wear, shoes and bags.Staff at the various outlets were helpful and attentive.The place was clean.Alteration service for clothes was prompt..it being a Monday.We enjoyed our shopping here.

Name: Travellove1025
Title: Plenty of options
Review: Well located and have plenty of options. The year end sale is worth waiting for. Though it may seem smaller compared to other new malls, it has everything one needs. Only negative is that it doesnt have lots of front space

Name: rama r
Title: Family
Review: Recently i went with my family to buy clothes lot of people r sujjest me to go that place and buy something the price was pretty good and lot of designs we all r enjoy to buy clothes and everything

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Looks really cool after the Renovation
Review: I visited this place along with a friend after more than a year and what I saw was a beautiful transformation for the better. It has been divided into two blocks [A & B] and there is a internal connection between both the blocks.Block A had PVR multiplex on the top floor and mostly dedicated to Men's wear, Women's wear, luggage, perfumes etc. It also has MC Donalds, KFC, Pizza Hut and Sub way in its basement. There is also a Cafe coffee day on the 3rd floor.Block B has Food Bazar on the top floor along with a food court which is about to open and on the 2nd and 3rd floors it has Hometown. The first floor is dedicated to Kids wear and Hamleys Outlet. The ground floor is dedicated to foot wear.The Mall is done really well and it looks classy. My only request is to increase the seating in the basement food court and make it more organized.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Decent mall
Review: Not the best of the lot but yes for a change you can drop by. But none of the fancy brands in the mall. Only central and some other shops and a pvr. Thats it.

Name: Rajani K
Title: Great place for weekend hangout
Review: So many branded stores under one roof of the central mall.  Apparels, foot wear, accessories, watches, bag packs, suitcases, glasses, electronics etc. are seen in stores here. There are restaurants and also Theatre/screen to watch a movie. Best place to spend quality time over weekend watching a movie, shopping and enjoy delicious food.

Name: Vallabha S
Title: Experience view and shopping
Review: Nice place to shopping and max brands available an exciting  offers and PVR MOVIE Experience  .Near by restaurants are available for more stuff . FOOD Court are available at basement for east access to food court .

Name: annejang
Title: One of the oldest and popular malls in Hyderabad
Review: Centrally located and hosts many popular shopping outlets. One can find everything here from shoes to watches to clothes. The places to eat are also decent.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: All in at one place?
Review: When I was wishited Hyderabad central with my friends ,we found that there are many types of shopping malls and like branded showrooms many more in that.My suggestion is best auccation for friends get together. I was forget to say that there is also a PVR CINEMA theater .

Name: Jikuza
Title: Mall Central to Hyderabad
Review: This mall stays true to its name and is central to Hyderabad. It is a decent mall to shop with outlets aplenty. It also houses the usual run of the mill outlets and quick service restaurants.

Name: zap r
Title: Good place for shopping!!
Review: 1.  Shopping here is quite good, offers and discounts on many brands.2.  Clothing,Watches, sunglasses, footwear, home needs, all under on roof.3.  PVR cinema has quite a few screens, movie experience is good.4.. Restaurants are ok, McD & kFC AVAILABLE.4.  No play zone for kids.5.  Parking is available.

Name: Repala S
Title: ALL UNDER ONE ROOF.....
Review: Hyderabad Central Mall is the Shopping Mall placed the center of the city. It is the best place for Entertainment and Shopping. It is the one shop store where all your needs are available under one roof. It is one of the biggest shopping mall consisting of Bookshops, Cafes, Restaurant, Jewelry showroom, Food Court.

Name: SamWorld
Title: Good discounts on brands
Review: A good place for brand shoppings at discounts... Not much entertainment or activities in mall... Just shopping, few restaurant and pvr cinema.... decent collections, good discounts and offers...Worth a visit!!

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: Shopping & Entertainment
Review: This place provides you wide range of brands for shopping. Which is easily accessible through public transport. Parking facility is available. PVR cinemas is available in the top floor.

Name: Ron G
Title: Good Place for Shopping
Review: Who are trying to purchase branded items on clothes, gifts or accessories of Men and Women.As well as entertainment of movie theater.Best Place for food courts of KFC, Pizza Hut, McDonald's. etc.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Mall with a PVR
Review: Not a big mall, but situated at the Punjagutta junction and has decent brands like the "Central", "PA" and has a food court with KFC & other stalls. It has a PVR cineplex too.

Name: Abdul
Title: Central  mall in the center
Review: My favourite brands like lombard, park avenue and KFC, pizza Hut available there, also the mall is in right in the center, always crowded, i love this place.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall In The Center Of City
Review: Its one of the Earlier Malls of the city which also has a Multiplex.It's located right in the center of the city and is very easy to travel and locate.It is a Six Floor Store with the top floor dedicated Exclusively to PVR Multiplex.Of the other Floors ,the Ground Floor has the three Fast food centres KFC,Mac Donalds ,Pizza Hut and a Womens Ethnic clothes Area.The other 4 Floors are divided along Youth Area,Kids Area,Mens Area and Womens Area.Over all the collection here is very good but the only problem is with the Parking space.
